rule: The response must be in an array format.
inverseRule: The response must not be in an array format.

rule: Each model name found in the abstract should be surrounded by double quotation marks and single inverted commas for model name identification.
inverseRule: Each model name found in the abstract should not be surrounded by any quotation marks.

rule: If no model names are identified or it's not certain, the response will contain only one element with "NA" value.
inverseRule: A response always contains multiple elements regardless of uncertainty.
